value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
value.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Configure Azure files and Azure File Sync
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure file and file sync.

value.title: Configure role-based access control
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use role-based access control to ensure resources are protected, but users can still access the resources they need.

value.title: Control access to Azure Storage with shared access signatures
value.excerpt: Grant access to data stored in your Azure Storage accounts securely through the use of shared access signatures.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft
value.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing for your application to improve the performance and availability of your application.

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Factory
value.excerpt: Evaluate whether Azure Data Factory can help you integrate your data sources. Describe how Azure Data Factory can ingest data from on-premises, multiple-cloud and SaaS data sources.

value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

value.title: Introduction to Azure solutions
value.excerpt: Get started with your digital transformation by exploring why now is the right time to begin, why Azure is the right platform, and how Azure can bring overall value to your organization. We'll demonstrate key scenarios that illustrate how digital transformation with Azure can empower employees, engage customers, optimize operations, and transform products.

value.title: Introduction to machine learning
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of machine learning for people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You’ll be introduced to some essential concepts, explore data, and interactively go through the machine learning life-cycle - using Python to train, save, and use a machine learning model like we would in the real world.

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.
